name: Ancient Light
description:
A puzzle dungeon crawler in which you collect fellow spirits to solve puzzles and avoid enemies.

On this very land, surrounding the humans, in every forest - big and small - live a hundred, maybe more, small spirits called Silvarii. They care for every tree and berry, keep the forests lush with life. Guide the lost through nooks and crannies, protecting their treasure: The Tree of Life.

Due to the darkness' arrival you have been separated from the others. Finding other spirits allows you to open the doors that kept out intruders for thousands of years, find your way back to the Tree of Life!
